General.Name: AB Snaige
General.Description: AB Snaige, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of refrigerators and related equipment in Lithuania. The company offers combined refrigerators with separate external doors, single cooler refrigerators, and freezers; commercial and medical refrigerators; household electrical appliances; spare parts for refrigerators; metal products; monoblocks for refrigeration units; tools and equipment; refrigerator-showcases; and wine refrigerators. The company offers its products under the SNAIGE brand. It also exports its products to approximately 30 countries primarily in Europe, Asia, and Africa. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Alytus, Lithuania. AB Snaige is a subsidiary of Sekenora Holdings Limited.

1.Name: Vytautas  Adomaitis
1.Title: Chief of the Accounting & Fin. Department
